00047 #define ARRAY_SET_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER "1.0"

00052 class XMLChConversion
00053 {
00054 private:
00056         XMLCh *str;
00057 
00061         void convert(int i)
00062         {
00063                 char cstr[64];
00064                 sprintf(cstr, "%d", i);
00065                 convert(cstr);
00066         }
00067 
00071         void convert(const char *const s)
00072         {
00073                 clear();
00074                 int n=(int)strlen(s);
00075                 str = new XMLCh[n+1];
00076                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00077                         str[i] = (XMLCh)s[i];
00078                 str[n]=0;
00079         }
00080 
00084         void convert(const wchar_t *const s)
00085         {
00086                 clear();
00087                 int n=(int)wcslen(s);
00088                 str = new XMLCh[n+1];
00089                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00090                         str[i] = (XMLCh)s[i];
00091                 str[n]=0;
00092         }
00093 
00095         void clear()
00096         {
00097                 if (str)
00098                         delete[] str;
00099                 str = NULL;
00100         }
00101 
00102 public:
00106         XMLChConversion(int i) { str=NULL; convert(i); }
00110         XMLChConversion(const wchar_t *const s) { str=NULL; convert(s); }
00114         XMLChConversion(std::wstring s) { str=NULL; convert( s.c_str() ); }
00118         XMLChConversion(const char *const s) { str=NULL; convert(s); }
00122         XMLChConversion(std::string s) { str=NULL; convert(s.c_str()); }
00124         ~XMLChConversion() { clear(); }
00128         const XMLCh *String() const { return str; }
00129 
00130 };
00131 
00133 #define ToXMLCh(s) ( XMLChConversion(s).String() )

00136 /*
00137  * Create the array element. This is the top level parent element.
00138  */
00139 DOMElement* CreateArrayElement(ArrayData &arrayData, DOMDocument* doc, const AffymetrixGuidType &dataTypeIdentifier)
00140 {
00141         // ArrayFile element
00142         DOMElement* arrayElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT));
00143         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(ARRAY_SET_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER));
00144         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(ARRAY_SET_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER));
00145         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_ID_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(arrayData.ArraySetFileIdentifier()));
00146         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_PROJECT_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(arrayData.InitialProject()));
00147         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_CREATE_DATE_TIME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(arrayData.CreationDateTime()));
00148         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_CREATED_BY_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(arrayData.CreatedBy()));
00149 
00150         std::wstring step = CreateStepToString(arrayData.CreatedStep());
00151         arrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_CREATED_STEP_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(step));
00152         return arrayElement;
00153 }

00155 /*
00156  * Add the physical arrays to the document if they exist.
00157  */
00158 void AddPhysicalArrays(ArrayData &arrayData, DOMDocument* doc, DOMElement* arrayElement)
00159 {
00160         int nArrays = (int) arrayData.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size();
00161         if (nArrays > 0 )
00162         {
00163                 DOMElement* physicalArraysElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAYS_ELEMENT));
00164                 for (int iArray=0; iArray<nArrays; iArray++)
00165                 {
00166                         ArrayAttributes &att = arrayData.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[iArray];
00167                         DOMElement* physicalArrayElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT));
00168                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_ARRAY_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(ARRAY_TYPE_IDENTIFIER));
00169                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_ID_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.Identifier()));
00170                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.ArrayName()));
00171                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_BARCODE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.ArrayBarcode()));
00172                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(MediaToString(att.Media())));
00173                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_ROW_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MediaRow()));
00174                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_COL_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MediaCol()));
00175                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_MEDIA_FILE_NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MediaFileName()));
00176                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_MEDIA_FILE_GUID_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MediaFileGUID()));
00177                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_LIB_PACKAGE_NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.LibraryPackageName()));
00178                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_MASTERFILE_GUID_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MasterFileId()));
00179                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_CREATED_BY_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.CreatedBy()));
00180                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_CREATION_DATE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.CreationDateTime()));
00181                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT_CREATED_STEP_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(CreateStepToString(att.CreatedStep())));
00182                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_MASTERFILE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.MasterFile()));
00183                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_PAT_ASSIGNMENT_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(PATAssignmentMethodToString(att.PatAssignment())));
00184                         physicalArrayElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ELEMENT_COMMENT_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(att.Comment()));
00185 
00186                         int nArraysAttributes = (int) att.Attributes().size();
00187                         for (int iArrayAttribute=0; iArrayAttribute<nArraysAttributes; ++iArrayAttribute)
00188                         {
00189                                 ParameterNameValuePair &param = att.Attributes()[iArrayAttribute];
00190                                 DOMElement* paramElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT));
00191                                 paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(PHYSICAL_ARRAY_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(param.Name));
00192                                 paramElement->setTextContent(ToXMLCh(param.Value));
00193                                 physicalArrayElement->appendChild(paramElement);
00194                         }
00195                         physicalArraysElement->appendChild(physicalArrayElement);
00196                 }
00197                 arrayElement->appendChild(physicalArraysElement);
00198         }
00199 }

00201 /*
00202  * Add the user attributes to the document if they exist.
00203  */
00204 void AddUserAttributes(ArrayData &arrayData, DOMDocument* doc, DOMElement* arrayElement)
00205 {
00206         int nUserAttributes = (int) arrayData.UserAttributes().size();
00207         if (nUserAttributes > 0)
00208         {
00209                 DOMElement* userAttributesElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ELEMENT));
00210 
00211                 affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator paramIt;
00212                 for (paramIt=arrayData.UserAttributes().begin(); paramIt!=arrayData.UserAttributes().end(); ++ paramIt)
00213                 {
00214                         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType &param = *paramIt;
00215                         DOMElement* paramElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT));
00216                         paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_NAME_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(param.GetName()));
00217                         paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(
00218                                 ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ParameterValueTypeToString(param.ValueType())));
00219                         if (param.RequiredFlag() == true)
00220                                 paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_REQUIRED_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh("true"));
00221                         if (param.HasDefault() == true)
00222                                 paramElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_ELEMENT_DEFAULT_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(param.DefaultToString()));
00223 
00224                         if (param.ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType)
00225                         {
00226                                 std::list<std::wstring>::iterator valIt;
00227                                 for (valIt = param.ControlMultiValues().begin(); valIt != param.ControlMultiValues().end(); ++valIt)
00228                                 {
00229                                         DOMElement *valueElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ELEMENT));
00230                                         valueElement->setTextContent(ToXMLCh(*valIt));
00231                                         paramElement->appendChild(valueElement);
00232                                 }
00233                         }
00234                         else
00235                         {
00236                                 DOMElement *valueElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ELEMENT));
00237                                 valueElement->setTextContent(ToXMLCh(param.ToString()));
00238                                 paramElement->appendChild(valueElement);
00239                         }
00240 
00241                         int nControl = (int) param.ControlledVocabulary().size();
00242                         if (nControl > 0)
00243                         {
00244                                 std::list<std::wstring>::iterator controlIt;
00245                                 for (controlIt=param.ControlledVocabulary().begin(); controlIt!=param.ControlledVocabulary().end(); ++controlIt)
00246                                 {
00247                                         DOMElement* controlElement = doc->createElement(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_CONTROL_ELEMENT));
00248                                         controlElement->setAttribute(ToXMLCh(USER_ATTRIBUTES_ATTRIBUTE_CONTROL_ELEMENT_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE), ToXMLCh(*controlIt));
00249                                         paramElement->appendChild(controlElement);
00250                                 }
00251                         }
00252                         userAttributesElement->appendChild(paramElement);
00253                 }
00254                 arrayElement->appendChild(userAttributesElement);
00255         }
00256 }

00273 /*
00274  * Write the entire file, the header and body.
00275  */
00276 bool ArrayFileWriter::Write(const std::string &fileName, affymetrix_calvin_array::ArrayData &arrayData)
00277 {
00278         // Initialize the XML4C2 system.
00279         try
00280         {
00281                 XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00282         }
00283         catch (const XMLException&)
00284         {
00285                 return false;
00286         }
00287 
00288         // Create a DOM implementation object and create the document type for it.
00289         DOMImplementation *impl = DOMImplementationRegistry::getDOMImplementation(ToXMLCh(L"LS"));
00290         //DOMDocumentType* dt  = impl->createDocumentType(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ELEMENT), 0, ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_DTD));
00291         DOMDocument* doc = impl->createDocument();
00292         doc->setStandalone(true);
00293         //doc->appendChild(dt);
00294 
00295         // Create the serializer.
00296         DOMWriter *theSerializer = ((DOMImplementationLS*)impl)->createDOMWriter();
00297         theSerializer->setEncoding(ToXMLCh(ARRAY_FILE_ENCODING));
00298 
00299         // ArrayFile element
00300         DOMElement* arrayElement = CreateArrayElement(arrayData, doc, dataTypeIdentifier);
00301 
00302         // PhysicalArrays element
00303         AddPhysicalArrays(arrayData, doc, arrayElement);
00304 
00305         // UserAttributes element
00306         AddUserAttributes(arrayData, doc, arrayElement);
00307 
00308         // Add the array element to the document.
00309         doc->appendChild(arrayElement);
00310 
00311         // Write the file.
00312         bool status = false;
00313         XMLFormatTarget *myFormTarget = new LocalFileFormatTarget(fileName.c_str());
00314         try
00315         {
00316                 theSerializer->writeNode(myFormTarget, *doc);
00317                 status = true;
00318         }
00319         catch (...)
00320         {
00321                 status = false;
00322         }
00323 
00324         // Clean up
00325         doc->release();
00326         theSerializer->release();
00327         delete myFormTarget;
00328         XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00329 
00330         return status;
00331 }
